MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Baird Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.18pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of digging required to make repairs to an underground cable fault on Baird Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.25pm on 23rd February 2021.
